column4: Hello, I have a question about updates notification, should I ticked all of them or I choose some of them?
choose the ones you want.  If bandwidth is not an issue, I would just choose all
i am on cable connection, and should I choose all of them?
which dialog are you referring to exactly?
next to my battery icon
as long as you haven't added outside repos, you should be ok
okay, should I take it all of them to update it or some of them? I am on the lappy
all are fine
maybe that will help you
okay great and thanks I'm gonna updating now..
it's works great in the updates and rebooted the box :)

polpak left a channel, and I needed up with a DVD movie play.. and I already installed the ccs and others, and the DVD cannot play, menus overlapped other menus, had to eject the DVD out by the mouse..
you mean libdvdcss?
no, it's in the restricted wiki site..
did you ever run /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/examples/install-css.sh to install libdvdcss?
what player are you using?  and is the problem only that the dvd loads but the menus are screwed up?
Totem
totem with xine or gstreamer backend?
non theme players, just plain totem
for dvd's I like xine, try installing gxine or xine-ui (or totem-xine if you want)
Okay, how I get the xine? I looked at other site looks good, does they have CC and stubtitles?
what is CC?
closed caption
I'll check them for you, I have never used it
okay
yes, I checked xine-ui and gxine and both have subtitle preferences.  I think gxine looks nicer in gnome, you should try that one imo
my DVD movies either CC and stubtitles. single player should have both CC or Stubtitle. just make sure it's both there..
just install gxine and try it :)  you can always remove it with one click if you don't like it
the totem only have stubtitles, no CC in other options..
okay how I get the gxine?
enable the universe repository and use synaptic
how to enable it, which program to be enabled it?
Aha! I got it, and then the screen warns me, should I back the the source.lst up or just cancelled not able to view it..
huh?
were you able to add universe?
I got multimedia universal showed up and not seen the xgine program
it's gxine
not in there
put the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ please
how copy and paste the list file?
gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
it's appeared text file about sources.list readonly
I just need you to copy what you see, paste it at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ and then give me a link
done
link?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/11556
you have universe, you should be able to see gxine in synaptic.  If that is giving you trouble, you can just do: sudo aptitude install gxine
E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
close synaptic
aha, looks good now :)
now which one I can open it?
sound and video > gxine
Kernel version-OK, MTRR-OK, CDROM-Failed, DVD-OK, DMA mode-Failed, X11-OK and Mit xv-OK
ok?
setup wizards
and does your media play?
it's works!
great
How I set the default to gxine?
you mean when you pop in a dvd?
yes
system > prefernces > removable drives and media
okay let me look at it
I found DVD command box, which the filename need to be in?
change totem to gxine
done
yep
Hmm I press the eject button doesn't comes out and I must use a mouse to eject it out..
yes
seem work prefectly :)
I popped the DVD in and it's auto opening gxine
Hmmm my dvd seem little paused every seconds, Should i need to turn on the DMA?
yeah
how I can find my CD param line like as hdc or what?
check /etc/fstab to see where it is getting mounted
fstab in the terminal box?
gedit /etc/fstab
/dev/hdc        /media/cdrom0   udf,iso9660 user,noauto     0       0
I'm back
u there?
DMA look better now, no more little pausing in my DVD movies :)
Did you enable the DMA for the CDRW/DVD drive?
yep
how old on your CD drive?
4 years, it's a toshiba sd-c2612 .  It's known to have problems from what I have gathered, but since it works sometimes I was hoping there could be something I could do to make it work more often
Hmm 4 years old need to replace it, since the laser going bad..
hrmm I see

vibration or laser bad, then replace new one. I've experinced with my CD drive vibrations goes bad, and I replaced the slim drive for my lappy, it's works good,  better get a sony or LG, not cheapie CD drive which is have no caches on it..
alright cool, what's an approximate price on what it cost you for the laptop one?
it's $69.99 at local puter shop I bought it..
did you get 4 updates? just all 4 installed and small terminal box show error or warning does it's affects on yours?
